## Overview

{{package_description}}

This library is an enhanced version of numpy with additional features and improvements.

## Features

- All features from the original numpy
- {{feature_1}}
- {{feature_2}}
- {{feature_3}}
- Seamless integration with other exp libraries

## Installation

```bash
pip install expnumpy
```
